#summary Gameplay instructions

= Game Pad Control =
  * Left stick to move player
  * Right stick to swing racket

= Keyboard/Mouse Control =
  * Left/right keys to move player
  * Mouse to swing racket

= Scoring =
  # Ball hit the net
  # Ball hit into player
  # Ball hit 4 times without crossing the net
  # Ball hit the floor after a player shot
  # Ball bounce on the floor twice without crossing the net
